node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `podcast` ( `podcast_id` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `description` text COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci, `link` char(255) COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `pubdate` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `announcement` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `createdby_user` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`podcast_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3 COLLATE=utf8mb3_unicode_ci
node.title: podcast
